title: Burnout Self-Assessment
description: Feeling exhausted lately? Check your burnout risk and take care of yourself!

questions.question: How do you feel when waking up in the morning?

choices.text: Tired and don't want to get up

questions.question: Your passion for work or studies is...

choices.text: Still find it fun and rewarding
Hard to focus, making more mistakes
All relationships are hard, want isolation
Toss and turn sometimes but okay
Trouble falling asleep or wake up often

questions.question: Do you engage in hobbies during free time?
Your thoughts about the future are...
Do you feel like you're taking care of yourself?

results.title: Healthy State
results.description: You are currently in a mentally and physically healthy state! You're maintaining good work-life balance and managing stress well. Keep taking care of yourself and maintain this healthy lifestyle.
results.advice: Keep up your current routine with regular rest and hobby activities.

results.title: Caution Needed
results.description: You're experiencing some fatigue buildup. It's not serious yet, but managing it now is important. Take some rest and reduce stress factors.
results.advice: Get enough sleep, exercise regularly, and engage in hobbies to recharge. Take some time away from work.

results.title: Warning Stage
results.description: Significant fatigue and stress have accumulated. You're at high risk for burnout and need active intervention. Prioritize rest and seek help if needed.
results.advice: Consider taking time off or reducing workload if possible. Consult a professional and prioritize self-care above all.

results.title: Burnout State
results.description: You are experiencing serious burnout. You're mentally and physically exhausted and may need professional help. Don't try to solve this alone - reach out for support.
results.advice: Seeking professional help (counselor, mental health professional) is strongly recommended. Your health is the top priority right now.
